ComicInfo.Summary:
Finally, the Black Knight vs. Sirin-- and Sirin has tricks she hasn't even revealed yet-- to save an entire Russian mob family! And the truth about Nadia's is bigger, and more horrific, than anyone imagined!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Riveiro & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Eman Cassalos & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Josh Burns | 3 | D | Cover D | Robert Atkins & Ceci de la Cruz | 4 | E | Pensacon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike Krome (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | F | Pensacon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Mike Krome (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | G | Spring Zenbox Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | H | Zodiac Pack Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
